price: 24. (Ici-bas), ils ont été guidés vers les bonnes paroles et vers la voie (d’Allah), le Digne de Toutes louanges.
arabic: وَهُدُوٓاْ إِلَى ٱلطَّيِّبِ مِنَ ٱلۡقَوۡلِ وَهُدُوٓاْ إِلَىٰ صِرَٰطِ ٱلۡحَمِيدِ

version.title: French Translation - Noor International Center
version.description: Translation of the Quran meanings into French, by Dr. Nabil Radwan, published by Noor International Center - was printed in 2017.

meta.transliteration: wahudū ilā al-ṭayibi mina al-qawli wahudū ilā ṣirāṭi al-ḥamīdi
